snippet.title: Warden: Melody of the Undergrowth - "Explore" Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order Warden: Melody of the Undergrowth now at http://warden-game.com/

Trapped in an ancient forest, a young prince searches for a lost god. Here he befriends the spirit of a young girl and a volatile child, and they quickly find their destinies intertwined.

Players control all three protagonists as they explore an overgrown fantasy landscape, meet its strange and wonderful inhabitants, and overcome the ancient magic and puzzles protecting it. All this is wrapped in a mesmerising story that challenges allegiances and true intentions.

Coming late 2015 for Steam, PC/Mac/Linux and Consoles!

Trailer score and Warden soundtrack composed by Shane Mesa. 
http://www.shanemesa.com/

Download one of the tracks featured in this trailer now!
https://soundcloud.com/shanemesa/sets/wardenost

Warden: Melody of the Undergrowth is developed by Cardboard Keep, a small team making big games:

Visit our website - http://cardboardkeep.com
Like us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/cardboardkeep
Follow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/cardboardkeep
